casebody.data:
No. 995,

Misc.

Parker v. North Carolina. T. W. Bruton, Attorney General of North Carolina, and James F. Bullock, Deputy Attorney General, for respondent.

Ct. App. N. C. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pau-peris granted. Certiorari granted. Case transferred to appellate docket and set for oral argument immediately following No. 1064 [394 U. S. 956].
